name: The Faith - A Moth-Light playbook
description:
A believer. A searcher. A hopeful. 

This is a playbook for the ttrpg Moth-Light, featuring a character full of faith, whether for a fortuitous or doomed end. A player with The Faith playbook is a beacon of hope on the planet Beacon, as well as a searcher of answers to ancient secrets.

You can find Moth-Light by Moth-Lands right here: https://moth-lands.itch.io/moth-light

The Google Sheets "Playsheet" has what you need to play The Faith in a game of Moth-Light. The "Full Playbook" has that and more explanations and provocative questions.

Because Moth-Light is a game currently in development, newer versions of that game may necessitate changes in this playbook. I'll do my best to keep up, but feel free to let me know if something doesn't line up. This was made to version 1.9b.
